hero_detail: Dedicated to developing the agricultural sector, improving farmers' livelihoods, and promoting sustainable farming practices in the Kurdistan Region - Iraq.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: Explore our wide range of our services.

list.title: Farmer Support & Training
list.detail: Providing hands-on training and technical support to help farmers improve productivity and adopt modern agricultural techniques.

list.title: Sustainable Farming Initiatives
list.detail: Encouraging organic farming, soil conservation, and pesticide-free agriculture to protect the environment and public health.

list.title: Market Linkages & Farmer Empowerment
list.detail: Strengthening market access for farmers by building direct connections between producers, suppliers, and consumers.

list.title: Agricultural Research & Innovation
list.detail: Conducting research and implementing innovative farming solutions to improve productivity and sustainability.

list.title: Financial & Policy Support
list.detail: Assisting farmers with financial aid, grants, and policy advocacy to enhance agricultural development.

list.title: Community Development & Rural Upliftment
list.detail: Supporting rural communities with infrastructure, education, and resources to enhance living standards.

list.title: Disaster & Crisis Management
list.detail: Providing emergency aid, recovery plans, and risk management strategies for farmers facing natural disasters.

list.title: Digital & Technological Support
list.detail: Implementing smart farming solutions, digital tools, and tech-based strategies to optimize agricultural efficiency.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: We are here to help you

About.title: About Us
About.aboutUs: Awdier Association is a non-governmental, independent, non-profit association, specialized in the developing and improving the agricultural sector and strives to improve the capabilities of farmers and increase their income and take care of the agricultural environment and improving the quality of production. It was established by ministerial order issued of the Ministry of Interior of the Kurdistan Region-Iraq No. () issued in //2023

BusinessDetails.name: Awdier Organization
BusinessDetails.tagline: Awdier Cooperative Association for the development of agriculture in the Kurdistan Region - Iraq
BusinessDetails.missionText: We empower farmers, boost productivity, and promote sustainable farming by improving income, providing advanced equipment, and advocating organic agriculture for healthier produce and rural economic stability.
BusinessDetails.visionText: To lead agricultural development in the Kurdistan Region by pioneering innovation, strengthening farmers, and ensuring a sustainable future through modern, eco-friendly practices.

CTA.title: Grow the agricultural sector with us
CTA.description: Contact us today for a more sustainable future

OliveProject.title: Transforming Kurdistanâ€™s Olive Industry
OliveProject.brief: A large-scale initiative to cultivate 415,000 olive trees and establish an advanced olive oil production facility in Erbil.

details.title: Sustainable Agriculture
details.description: This project focuses on utilizing sustainable farming practices, including modern irrigation techniques and organic production.

details.title: Advanced Oil Production
details.description: We are building an advanced olive oil extraction plant with a capacity of up to 10,000 tons annually.

details.title: Regional Impact
details.description: This initiative contributes to local food security, economic growth, and potential exports to Gulf countries.
